        public void onOpen​(javax.websocket.Session session,
                   java.lang.String net_id)
            throws java.io.IOException
        What occurs when someone enters the chat application.
        Parameters:
        session - - The session of the user who has entered the chat application.
        net_id - - The NetID of the user who wants to chat to others.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - Potential exception that could occur.

      • onMessage

        public void onMessage​(javax.websocket.Session session,
                      java.lang.String message)
               throws java.io.IOException
        We are only doing one-on-one conversations, so we will be using the sendMessageToParticularUser method below and force one-on-ones that way. It's sort of a janky way of going about it, but we can just auto-append @net_ids to the start of messages and it can work. It was sick.
        Parameters:
        session -
        message -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
